reviewText:
Honored to be the first!!!!!! Just a quick review. Terrible print!! But interesting nonetheless. Interesting scene of Roman legion marching by the sea. Gives indication of militarism of ancient Rome.
Moreover, but I felt a convoluted ending, with characters being mixed up. Maybe I am wrong!!
Finally, provides good companion viewing with Kino's "Cabiria" and "Last Days of Pompei"
Enjoy. Look for other Vista titles: i.e. a silent version of "Spartacus"!!!!
